alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Walker and southern Winston Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 725 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Kansas to near Lynns Park. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Carbon Hill, Sipsey, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Curry, Smith Dam, Ashbank, Rocky Hollow, Beloit, Lynns Park, Smith Lake, Cedrum Area, Holly Grove, Powellville and Lupton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Alabama.
